title: Barracuda logo font?
content:
I've seen the lowercase "a" before but can't remember where. Any help is appreciated. Thanks.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Untitled-2.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828223222/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-2_10.png) | 2.34 KB |
author: lightwing1

comments.content: Don't know this one. To me, it's either a freebie "based on" Helvetica Neue or Helvetica Neue with a custom /a.
FYI - I called Barracuda to get a copy of their new logo and asked about the font. It is a customized version of Helvetica, just like you said. Thanks for playing! :-)
